groupedServiceList.name: Application for Driving License
groupedServiceList.description: Application for Driving License

groupedServiceList.name: Registration for Driving Test
groupedServiceList.description: Registration for Driving Test

groupedServiceList.name: Driving License Exam Results
groupedServiceList.description: Driving License Exam Results

groupedServiceList.name: Renewal of Driving License
groupedServiceList.description: Renewal of Driving License

groupedServiceList.name: Duplicate of Driving License
groupedServiceList.description: Duplicate of Driving License

groupedServiceList.name: Traffic Fines
groupedServiceList.description: Traffic Fines

groupedServiceList.name: Replacement of Definitive Driving License
groupedServiceList.description: Replacement of Definitive Driving License

groupedServiceList.name: Motor Vehicle Inspection
groupedServiceList.description: Motor Vehicle Inspection

groupedServiceList.name: Correction of Driving License
groupedServiceList.description: This service enables provisional driving license holders to correct information on their license. To determine eligibility for the correction, applicants must first visit the Rwanda National Police BUSANZA office (Department of Testing and Licensing) or email tlcustomerservice@police.gov.rw or call 118. Once the Rwanda National Police approves the correction request, applicants can proceed to Irembo to submit their application and make the necessary payment.

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate of Nationality
groupedServiceList.description: The nationality Certificate is granted to a Rwandan to certify that he as the rwandan nationality. The application is processed by local Government authorities at the sector level.This document has a validity of three months

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate of Being Alive
groupedServiceList.description: Icyemezo cy'uko Umuntu Ariho gitangwa n'ubuyobozi cyikerekana ko umuntu ariho. Dosiye isaba yoherezwa mu buyobozi bw’inzego z’ibanze ku murenge kugirango isuzumwe. Icyi cyemezo gifite agaciro k'amezi atatu.

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate for Replacement of National Identity Card
groupedServiceList.description: A temporary Identification is granted to Rwandans who lost or damaged their National Identity Card, as they wait for their new ID to be produced. The application is processed by the Local Administration authorities at the Sector level. This document is valid for 60 days.

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate of Full Identity
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows users to apply for Certificate of Full Identity. It can serve as one of the supporting documents for the application of services such as to register for primary and secondary school national exams; military registration/recruitment, visa application, etc. The application is processed by local Government authorities at the sector level. This certificate has a three months validity

groupedServiceList.name: Change of name
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows the user to change their name.

groupedServiceList.name: Application for National ID Correction
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows Rwandans to request and pay for the correction of their identity card. After the payment the payment, the applicant must go to the selected sector and show the supporting documents which justify the reason for his request.

groupedServiceList.name: Application for National ID
groupedServiceList.description: This service enables Rwanda citizens to apply for a national ID. The applicant must have an application number in NIDA offices. To obtain your identity card, you have first to go to the sector for biometric data . An applicant who does not have the application number should carry any Identification to the the Civil Registration officer (CRO) at the nearest sector before applying for the National ID.

groupedServiceList.name: National ID Replacement
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows Rwandans to apply for a temporary identity document which in replacement of their identity card lost. The applicant must first inform the police that his identity card is lost to receive a certificate of loss that he will present to the Civil Registration Officer. After approval, the civil registration officer will submit the application to Nida for production of a new identity card. In case you have forgotten the number of the lost ID card, please contact the sector office of your registration for assistance.

groupedServiceList.name: Title Transfer
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows landowners to transfer their land rights to someone else

groupedServiceList.name: Land Merging
groupedServiceList.description: This services allows applicants who wish to avail their parcel as collateral to another party for a loan. A successful application results into a land collaterall document.

groupedServiceList.name: Subdivision
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows land owners to apply for subdividing one parcel into smaller ones. After a successful processing of this application, new plot documents for each subsidiary parcel will be provided to replace the previous  document.

groupedServiceList.name: Change of Land Use
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows land owners to align their land's use with the latest version of the city's master plan. A successful application results into a new land document with an updated land use.

groupedServiceList.name: Title Details Update
groupedServiceList.description: Iyi serivisi ifasha ba nyir'ubutaka gusaba guhuza ibibanza bibiri nyangwa birenga bikaba ikibanza kimwe. Iyo dosiye imaze gutunganywa, uwasabye bamuha icyangombwa  kimwe cy'ubutaka bwahujwe.

groupedServiceList.name: Sporadic Registration
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows land owners whose parcels were not registered during the systematic land registration to get their parcel(s) registered. A successful application results into a new land document with the latest standards.

groupedServiceList.name: Authentication for Loan Agreement
groupedServiceList.description: This services allows applicants who wish to avail their parcel as collateral to another party for a loan. A successful application results into a land collaterall document.

groupedServiceList.name: Rectification of Boundaries and Area Correction
groupedServiceList.description: The Rectification of Boundaries and Area Correction service enables land owners to request adjustments to their property boundaries and area measurements. Once the lands are rectified, new e-titles are produced.

groupedServiceList.name: Registration of condominium and split of condominium
groupedServiceList.description: This service facilitates associations and companies in registering and splitting condominium units within buildings or properties. It streamlines the process of converting buildings into condominium units, ensuring efficiency in registration and division. Upon completion, applicants have the convenience of downloading condominium unit titles.

groupedServiceList.name: Purchase an Official Gazette
groupedServiceList.description: This service enables applicants to purchase the official gazette. Applicants will apply and pay for the gazette, then gazettes will be delivered to the applicants’ respective addresses. Applicants can purchase a copy or several copies of a gazette every time a new gazette is out. Processing Time: 1 Day ,Price : Depends on documents.

groupedServiceList.name: Publish in the Official Gazette
groupedServiceList.description: This service enables applicants who want to publish in the official gazette to pay after being granted permission to do so. The publications paid for are for a change of name granted by MINALOC, Legal personality of NGOs and FBOs granted by RGB and Legal personality for cooperatives granted by RCA.Publication types:- Change of name,-Legal personality, Processing Time: 14 Days, Price : Depends on documents

groupedServiceList.name: Various Notary Services
groupedServiceList.description: Various Notary Services

groupedServiceList.name: Community Based Health Insurance(Mutuelle)
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows Rwandans to pay Community Based Health Insurance (Mutuelle) for their household.

groupedServiceList.name: Yellow fever vaccination
groupedServiceList.description: This service enables applicants to book a time slot at Rwanda biomedical center in Gikondo to get a yellow fever vaccination.

groupedServiceList.name: COVID-19 Test
groupedServiceList.description: COVID-19 Test

groupedServiceList.name: Laboratory tests
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows you to pay for your laboratory tests and provide proof of payment.

groupedServiceList.name: Health facility licensing
groupedServiceList.description: Health facility licensing

groupedServiceList.name: Application for Equating Foreign Qualifications
groupedServiceList.description: This service enables people who attended their higher education from foreign institute to apply for the equivalency certificate from the Rwandan Higher Education system.

groupedServiceList.name: Application for Equating Foreign Qualifications - General Education
groupedServiceList.description: Application for Equating Foreign Qualifications - General Education

groupedServiceList.name: Foreign Equivalency Certification for TVET
groupedServiceList.description: This service enables people who received technical and vocational education from foreign institutions to apply for an equivalency certificate from the National Examination and School Inspection Authority.

groupedServiceList.name: Provision of MOUs to International NGOs, National NGOs and Private companies in Education
groupedServiceList.description: This is a service given to International NGOs, National NGOs and Private companies (corporate social responsibilities interventions)willing to sign MOUs with the Ministry of Education for them to intervene in the development of Education in Rwanda

groupedServiceList.name: Recommendation for importation of used IT equipment
groupedServiceList.description: This service is given to schools and other educational institutions that need to import used IT equipment for education purposes.

groupedServiceList.name: Issuance of Recommendation Letter to NGO by MINEDUC
groupedServiceList.description: This service is to issue recommendation letters to international NGO operating in Rwanda under the ministry of education.

groupedServiceList.name: ECD Accreditation certificate
groupedServiceList.description: ECD Accreditation certificate

groupedServiceList.name: Transport Authorization
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows individual motorcyclists to request for a transport authorization.

groupedServiceList.name: Transport License
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows motorcyclist to apply for a Transport License

groupedServiceList.name: VAT Exemption
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows local manufacturers, assemblers, and miners to get value-added tax exemptions for raw materials, capital goods, and machinery. Applicants must submit a duly completed list of the raw materials, capital goods, or machinery used to make their final products. You will need to use the template provided in the application form to fill in the details.

groupedServiceList.name: Import Permit
groupedServiceList.description: IMPORT_PERMIT_DESCRIPTION

groupedServiceList.name: Premise registration
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows a business operating a garage to register it and comply with Rwanda Inspectorate, Competition and Consumer Protection Authority(RICA) regulation. This registration certificate is then used to obtain an operating license.

groupedServiceList.name: Business Operator License
groupedServiceList.description: Business Operator License

groupedServiceList.name: Product registration
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows a business that would like to sell, or manufacture fertilizer in Rwanda to participate in an efficacy trial after being assessed and approved by Rwanda Inspectorate, Competition and Consumer Protection Authority regulation (RICA). The business can then apply to get a product registration certificate after a successful trial. General requirements: - Having a registered local agent - Submission of sample for testing

groupedServiceList.name: Meat transportation carrier registration
groupedServiceList.description: This is a service is requested by a business to register a meat transportation carrier. RICA will conduct an inspection of the carrier to ensure that it complies with RICA regulatory requirements.

groupedServiceList.name: State Land Industrial Parks
groupedServiceList.description: State Land Industrial Parks

groupedServiceList.name: Merger notification
groupedServiceList.description:
This service allows local companies to apply for approval from RICA for merging or acquiring other companies.
Applicants must submit a dully completed list of requirements.

groupedServiceList.name: Forest planting materials: tree seeds, seedlings, grafted planting stocks, cuttings
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows individuals or organizations to submit a request and make payment for acquiring planting seeds including tree seeds, seedlings, grafted planting stocks, and cuttings to plant their own forest.

groupedServiceList.name: Forest Products Exportation License
groupedServiceList.description: This service provided by the Rwanda Forestry Authority (RFA) enables individuals or organizations to apply for an export permit for forest products. The permit allows for the legal exportation of forest resources outside of Rwanda's borders. Applicants must adhere to regulatory requirements set forth by RFA to ensure compliance with national and international standards for sustainable forest management and trade.

groupedServiceList.name: Request for Laboratory and Field Tests
groupedServiceList.description: This service is to request laboratory and field tests to enable clients to pay for their tests and proceed with testing.

groupedServiceList.name: Meteo Services
groupedServiceList.description: Meteo Services

groupedServiceList.name: Forest harvest permit
groupedServiceList.description: Forest harvest permit

groupedServiceList.name: Forest Products Transportation Permit
groupedServiceList.description: This service enables applicants planning to transport forest products to apply for permission to relocate them within the country.

groupedServiceList.name: Permit to place directional sign post
groupedServiceList.description: Permit to place directional sign post

groupedServiceList.name: ISBN Issuance
groupedServiceList.description: ISBN Issuance

groupedServiceList.name: Visiting National Heroes' Mausoleums
groupedServiceList.description: This service is open to both Rwandans and foreigners, enabling them to visit National Heroes' Mausoleums in Rwanda. It provides an opportunity to learn more about heroism values and outstanding achievers through Rwandan citizens or foreigners who have distinguished themselves through acts of heroism and other displays of bravery, serving as exemplary role models.

groupedServiceList.name: Schedule a Visit
groupedServiceList.description: This Service allows a person or a group of people to schedule a visit to any of the National Museums of Rwanda.

groupedServiceList.name: Re-schedule a Visit
groupedServiceList.description: This Service allows a person or a group of people to reschedule a visit to any of the National Museums of Rwanda.

groupedServiceList.name: Museum activities
groupedServiceList.description: Museum activities

groupedServiceList.name: Visiting Genocide Memorial sites
groupedServiceList.description: This service is open to both Rwandans and foreigners, allowing them to visit Genocide memorial sites and learn more about the 1994 Genocide Against the Tutsi in Rwanda.

groupedServiceList.name: Validate Power of attorney documents
groupedServiceList.description: Validate Power of attorney documents

groupedServiceList.name: Requesting for International Flag(s) while Participating and Hosting an International Sport Event
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows national sports federation to ask for a recommendation letter from the Ministry of Sports to use as a supporting document while asking for International flags of the countries participating  in the International sport event.

groupedServiceList.name: Travel Authorization for Student Athletes
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows Rwandan sport federations to request travel clearance from MINEDUC  for their delegates that are under the age of 16 who plan to travel internationally to attend and participate in a sport related event.

groupedServiceList.name: Local Organizing Committee Stakeholders Engagement
groupedServiceList.description: Local Organizing Committee Stakeholders Engagement

groupedServiceList.name: Insurance coverage request for national team players
groupedServiceList.description: Insurance coverage request for national team players

groupedServiceList.name: Recommendation Letter Services
groupedServiceList.description: TO_WHOM_IT_MAY_CONCERN_LETTERS_DESCRIPTION

groupedServiceList.name: Infrastructure Development Technical Support
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows individuals and organizations looking to build sport facilities that meet standards to submit required documents to the Ministry of Sports and get recommendations on necessary improvements before proceeding with their construction project.

groupedServiceList.name: Authorization to Host a Sport Event
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows sport federations to apply for an authorization certificate from the Ministry of Sports, granting them permission to organize and host sports events, summits, seminars, workshops, or training sessions.

groupedServiceList.name: Financial Support for Sports-Related Activities
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows national sport federations to apply for financial support from the MINISPORTS for any sport related activities or events.

groupedServiceList.name: Survey Visa Permit
groupedServiceList.description: The National Institute of Statistics of Rwanda(NISR) issues visas to conduct surveys to anyone who intends to collect data in Rwanda.

groupedServiceList.name: Survey publish report
groupedServiceList.description: This service involves obtaining the necessary authorization for publishing your survey report. Anyone who has collected data using an NISR visa must submit their report and dataset for approval before proceeding with publication.

groupedServiceList.name: Issuance of recommendation letters to Rwandan living abroad for land-related services
groupedServiceList.description: This service facilitates Rwandans living abroad in obtaining recommendation letters from MINAFFET for land-related services such as transfer of ownership and construction permits. The recommendation letters aim to assist them in speeding up the process.

groupedServiceList.name: Issuance of Note-Verbales to Rwandan officials travelling on official missions
groupedServiceList.description: This service is specifically designed for holders of diplomatic and service passport. The purpose of the Note-Verbales is to facilitate the process of obtaining a visa for these officials.

groupedServiceList.name: Facilitation of issuance of plate numbers
groupedServiceList.description: Facilitation of issuance of plate numbers

groupedServiceList.name: Legalization of public documents from Rwanda to be used abroad/Apostille
groupedServiceList.description: Legalization of public documents from Rwanda to be used abroad/Apostille

groupedServiceList.name: Legalization of public documents from abroad to be used in Rwanda
groupedServiceList.description: Legalization of public documents from abroad to be used in Rwanda

groupedServiceList.name: Legalization of Power of Attorney for transfer of property
groupedServiceList.description: Legalization of Power of Attorney for transfer of property

groupedServiceList.name: Request for tax Exemption of personal belongings of Rwandans returning back home from abroad
groupedServiceList.description: This service is for Requesting for tax Exemption of personal belongings of Rwandans returning back home from abroad on a permanent basis.

groupedServiceList.name: Issuance of recommendation letter for Visa or Permit
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows diplomats, expertise, international organization staff and their dependents to apply for recommendation letter for Permit/Visa from MINAFFET.

groupedServiceList.name: Issuance of recommendation letter for Diplomatic and Service E-Passport
groupedServiceList.description: Issuance of recommendation letter for Diplomatic and Service E-Passport

groupedServiceList.name: Criminal Record Certificate
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows Rwandans and foreigners living/who have lived in Rwanda to apply for a Criminal Record Certificate. This certificate has a validity of 6 months.

groupedServiceList.name: Criminal Investigation Clearance Certificate
groupedServiceList.description: Criminal Investigation Clearance Certificate

groupedServiceList.name: Clearance certificate to transfer a deceased body abroad
groupedServiceList.description: Clearance certificate to transfer a deceased body abroad

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate of Good conduct
groupedServiceList.description: Certificate of Good conduct

groupedServiceList.name: Lost and theft certificate
groupedServiceList.description: This service provides assistance in obtaining Lost and Theft Certificates for individuals or companies that have experienced the loss or theft of their valuable possessions (documents, various items, etc.). The application is sent to the nearest RIB station for evaluation and processing. The document is valid for 1 month.

groupedServiceList.name: INTERPOL-KIGALI Motor Vehicle Clearance
groupedServiceList.description: This service is requested by an Individual or a company that wants to relocate a motor vehicle outside Rwanda. This certificate has a validity of 1 month.

groupedServiceList.name: Fingerprint Certificate
groupedServiceList.description: Fingerprint Certificate

groupedServiceList.name: Recommendation Letter for VAT Exemption
groupedServiceList.description: Recommendation Letter for VAT Exemption

groupedServiceList.name: Recommendation Letter to NGOs in Agriculture Sector
groupedServiceList.description: Recommendation Letter to NGOs in Agriculture Sector

groupedServiceList.name: Purchase the bovine semen
groupedServiceList.description: Purchase the bovine semen

groupedServiceList.name: Livestock Relocation
groupedServiceList.description: This service enables citizens to relocate livestock between sectors and districts. Sector veterinary authorities approve relocations within sectors, district veterinary authorities oversee district-to-district moves within Rwanda.

groupedServiceList.name: Accreditation for Foreign Media
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows foreign media to apply and pay for accreditation in order to exercise their profession of journalism in Rwanda.

groupedServiceList.name: Application for Photography and Video Shooting Permit
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows Rwandan and foreign production companies and individuals to shoot images and videos in public for documentary and fiction film productions. This permission does not exempt the filming crew of necessary formalities when requested by local authorities on the field and requesting authorisation for drones and special materials.

groupedServiceList.name: Application and Payment of National Flag
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows individuals, companies and organizations who need to get new national flag(s). This service is processed by local Government.

groupedServiceList.name: Request for travel clearance during Umuganda
groupedServiceList.description: This service is designed to assist individuals or groups who need to travel during Umuganda for reasons such as funeral services, emergency meetings, commemoration of the genocide against Tutsi, or any other urgent reasons. The service can be requested through Ministry of Local Government (MINALOC)

groupedServiceList.name: Fireworks Import Permit
groupedServiceList.description: Fireworks Import Permit

groupedServiceList.name: Authorization to display fireworks
groupedServiceList.description: Authorization to display fireworks

groupedServiceList.name: Blasting materials import permit
groupedServiceList.description: Blasting materials import permit

groupedServiceList.name: Blasting materials usage permit
groupedServiceList.description: Blasting materials usage permit

groupedServiceList.name: NCST Conference Registration
groupedServiceList.description: This service enables applicants to register for the 2nd Rwanda STI Conference 2024 under the theme: "Promoting Climate Resilient Agriculture through Science, Technology, and Innovation for Improved Food Security and Nutrition" organized by the National Council for Science and Technology (NCST) in collaboration with national and international partners. Applicants must pay registration fees and it will cover conference attendance, coffee/tea breaks, lunch each day, a welcome reception dinner, and a conference package. If exhibitors from the same institution are more than one, others will apply for waiver.

groupedServiceList.name: Birth Services
groupedServiceList.description: Birth Services

groupedServiceList.name: Marriage Services
groupedServiceList.description: Marriage Services

groupedServiceList.name: Death Services
groupedServiceList.description: Death Services

groupedServiceList.name: Adoption Record
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows the user to apply for child adoption record. The application will be submitted to the civil registration officer of a sector where the child is registered. This document has unlimited validity.

groupedServiceList.name: Record of Recognition
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows the user to apply for child recognition record. The application will be submitted to the civil registration officer of a sector where the child is registered. This document has unlimited validity.

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate of Succession
groupedServiceList.description: Icyemezo cyo Kuzungurag ihabwa umunyarwanda uzungura ibyasizwe n'uwo mu muryango we witabye Imana. Icyi cyemezo g ishyirwaho umukono n'Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'umurenge aho uwitabye Imana n'umuryango we bari batuye. Ifishi igaragaza ko abazungura bahari kandi ko habayeho inama y'umuryango yo kubemeza.Iherekezwa n'indi fishi ibyemeza (ifishi7) ishyirwaho imyirondoro y'abazungura n'abagize umuryango bitabiriye inama. Ibiri ku ifishi ni: indangamuntu z'abagize umuryango, isano bafitanye na nyakwigendera n'imikono yabo.Icyitonderwa: Amafishi 7 na 29 ushobora kuyasanga ku biro by'umukozi ushinzwe ubutaka ku murenge zigashyirwaho umukono n'Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa. Ibibazo birebana n'ubutaka bisaba ko amafishi yombi aba ariho umukono. Iyo ari ibibazo bitarebana n'ubutaka, ifishi 29 niyo yuzuzwa gusa ikanashyirwaho umukono.

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate of Cohabitation
groupedServiceList.description: The Certificate of cohabitation is issued to foreigners legally married to Rwandan citizens living in Rwanda. This allows a foreigner to apply for a Rwandan Nationality. Also, Rwandan citizens can use the certificate to claim for services in their spouse's country of origin (i.e. Visa, children's registration, apply for nationality, etc.). This certificate has a validity of 3months.

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate for Widow/Widower
groupedServiceList.description: The Certificate of being a widow or widower is a signed confirmation given to Rwandan citizens whose spouses are deceased. This document confirms the civil status of the person requesting the certificate. The application is processed by local Government authorities at the sector level.

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate of Residence
groupedServiceList.description: The Certificate of residence is an offficial document that certifies where the person resides. The application is processed by Local Government authorities at the sector of residence. The certificate has a validity of three months

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate of Genocide Survivors
groupedServiceList.description: The certificate of Genocide Survival is a certificate issued by the cell to genocide survivors upon request to be used as a supporting document in order to give them access to the Assistance Fund for Genocide Survivors (Fonds d'Assistance aux rescapes du genocide, FARG)

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate of Being Single
groupedServiceList.description: Icyemezo cy'uko Umuntu ari Ingaragu gitangwa n'ubuyobozi cyikerekana ko ari ingaragu. Icyi cyemezo gishobora gukoreshwa mu gusaba serivisi zinyuranye nko kwiyandikisha kugirango ushyingirwe, gusaba inguzanyo muri banki, gushaka ubwishingizi, n'ibindi...Dosiye isaba yoherezwa mu buyobozi bw’inzego z’ibanze ku murenge kugirango isuzumwe. Icyi cyemezo ifite agaciro k'amezi atatu.

groupedServiceList.name: Divorce Services
groupedServiceList.description: Divorce Services

groupedServiceList.name: Authentication for an orphan's status
groupedServiceList.description: This service offers an official verification or confirmation of the orphan status to citizens.

groupedServiceList.name: Certificate of Needy Survivor of the Genocide Perpetrated against the Tutsi in 1994
groupedServiceList.description: Certificate of Needy Survivor of the Genocide Perpetrated against the Tutsi in 1994

groupedServiceList.name: Guardianship Record
groupedServiceList.description:
This service allows the user to apply for a guardianship record. The application will be submitted to the civil registration office of the sector where the event was registered for those whose guardianship was registered before July 2023 
 However, those whose guardianship was registered after July 2023 will proceed with payment to get the record.

groupedServiceList.name: Gender and Family Promotion MoUs
groupedServiceList.description: Gender and Family Promotion MoUs

groupedServiceList.name: Recommendation Letter for Persons with Disabilities
groupedServiceList.description: Recommendation Letter for Persons with Disabilities

groupedServiceList.name: e-Passport Application
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows Rwandans to apply for the E-Passport to facilitate their travels outside the country. The Directorate General of Immigration and Emigration issues three types of passports: ordinary, service, and a diplomatic passport.

groupedServiceList.name: Laissez-passer
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows users to apply for a laissez-passer

groupedServiceList.name: Visa Application
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows the user to apply for a visa

groupedServiceList.name: Permits
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows the user to apply for a permit

groupedServiceList.name: Foreigner ID Card
groupedServiceList.description: Foreigner ID Card

groupedServiceList.name: Foreigner Travel Document
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows foreigners to request an emergency travel document.

groupedServiceList.name: Pay for Transfer/Transcription Fees
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows users to pay transcription/transfer fees.

groupedServiceList.name: Penalty Payments
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows users to pay for penalties. These penalties include administrative, transport, travel documents, visas, and permits penalties.

groupedServiceList.name: DPA payment
groupedServiceList.description:
This service allows rwandans above 16 years old, living abroad and without national ID to pay for an e-passport requested at their embassy.
To pay for this service, citizens need a valid reference number delivered by DGIE after the initial application process at the embassy.

groupedServiceList.name: CEPGL Services
groupedServiceList.description: The CEPGL travel document is issued to a Rwandan, or a foreigner legally residing in Rwanda, allowing him/her to travel to member states of the Economic Community of the Great Lakes Countries and in accordance with the existing agreements signed among such countries; Burundi, Democratic Republic of Congo.

groupedServiceList.name: Rwandan Nationality
groupedServiceList.description: Rwandan Nationality

groupedServiceList.name: Permit and Visa Transfer
groupedServiceList.description: This service allows an applicant to apply online for a visa or permit transfer into a new passport. This application should be done by applicants who already have a valid Rwandan visa or permit and have had their passport lost, stolen, or damaged; or want to transfer a permit or visa from an expired passport into a new passport.

groupedServiceList.name: Rwandan Nationality by Origin
groupedServiceList.description: A person who applies for the Rwandan nationality by origin must be born to at least one Rwandan parent who is a Rwandan not through acquisition but by virtue of Rwandan ancestry. Follow-up time: Three months after receipt of application.

groupedServiceList.name: Recovery of Rwandan Nationality
groupedServiceList.description: Recovery of Rwandan Nationality

groupedServiceList.name: Rwandan Nationality by Acquisition
groupedServiceList.description: Rwandan Nationality by Acquisition

groupedServiceList.name: Authorization to access Refugee Camp
groupedServiceList.description: This service is provided to camp-based refugees who need to go out of the camp in other districts other than the district hosting the camp for different reasons.
